attributes.action: give less benefits to stay at home parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make them work for their income, use the money currently given in benefits to provide creche facilities for all parents so that all parents can take responsibility for their offspring by working for the money it takes to provide for their own children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
